name: 劉傳銘
objective: 本課程介紹四種自動機型態,並討論正規語言與自動機之關係.主題包含: (1) 語言及其表示法, (2) 文法, (3) 有限自動機及規律文法, (4) Context Free文法, (5) Pushdown 自動機, (6) 杜林機器, (7) 停止問題及型態 0文法, 和 (8) 線性包含自動機與 Context Sensitive文法.
schedule:
-Introduction to the Theory of Computation (1.5 weeks)
-Finite Automata (2 weeks)
-Regular Languages and Regular Grammars (2.5 weeks)
-Properties of Regular Languages (2 weeks)
-Context-Free Languages (2 weeks)
-Simplification of Context-Free Grammars and Normal Forms (2 weeks)
-Pushdown Automata (2 weeks)
-Properties of Context-Free Languages (1 weeks)
-Turing Machines (2 weeks)
-Other Models of Turing Machines (1 weeks)
scorePolicy:
Assignments (40%): 6-8 homework sets.
Midterm (30%)
Final exam (30%)
materials:
Textbook: 
Peter Linz, An Introduction to Formal Languages and Automata, 4th edition, Jones and Bartlett Publishers, 2006. ISBN: 0-7673-3798-4.

References: 
1. John E. Hopcroft and Jeffery D. Ullman, Formal Languages and Their Relation to Automata, Addison-Wesley Publishing Company, 1969.
2. Harry R. Lewis and Christos H. Papadimitriou, Elements of the Theory of Computation, Prentice-Hall, 1998. ISBN: 0-13-262478-8.
